text: Mar del Plata is a city of Argentina in the Buenos Aires Province. It is found on the coast of the Atlantic Ocean, about 400 km south of Buenos Aires. Mar del Plata has a population of 541,733 people. It is the 7th biggest city in Argentina. == Other websites == * Official Government website * Tourist Info (from the Official Government website) * Mar del Plata Website with news and things to do
title: Mar del Plata
